summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, widening, extending, altering and establishing of Lakedell Avenue from the east line of H. E. Holmes' Addition to the City of Seattle to the east margin of Thirty-second Avenue; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law.
